remarks: A subset of a free module obtained by restricting the support set is spanned by the relevant unit vectors.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Feb-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ frlmsslsp as of 24-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)

frlmsslspOLD.c $e |- C = { x e. B | ( `' x " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) C_ J } $.
frlmsslspOLD $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. V /\ J C_ I ) -> ( K ` ( U " J ) ) = C ) $.
